attributes.additional_details: Based on a Wikipedia  page on Dominic Cummings, it seems his background is questionable.
attributes.background: This is a petition to sack Dominic Cummings. On the basis, he has no formal qualifications to be the most senior advisor to Boris Johnson. His political experience is minimal.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments, this includes petitions asking for people to be given or to lose their jobs.
